name: Me and my eldritch parasite (itch)
description:
Note: the HTML version has worse graphics due to render limitations, I recommend playing the downloadable version.

So you are joined with an eldritch parasite. Others say it's normal, but are damn tired of it. So you have decided to sneak into a facility said to have some sort of solution to the issue. But it also has anti-parasite devices that don't remove its link, so they will also kill you. Painfully. And the place is filled with those. Will you make it?

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move / use doors / move parasite
  • Enter / Space: hold to switch to moving parasite

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021.
